comments:
Using RC7, when a launch has terminated, it is possible to have some left-overs from the previous debug session.
If by mistake you select Assign Value action from this pane when the launch is terminated, you get a NPE. See stack trace below.

I think the pane should be cleared when the launch is terminated. I will attach the screenshot.

Created an attachment (id=43903)
See the detail pane on the top right corner.

Fixed in VariablesView - set details pane content to empty when the input changes to "null". Also, fixed AsynchronousViewer to send an empty selection change notification when viewew input changes and there was a previous selection (which updates the "assign value" action to be disabled).
*** Bug 144696 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
